input.sentences: the leaves were wet with ice crystals .
the view of ice and trees was lovely .
the plants were frosted and alive .
near the tracks was more snow .
the water and forest area was green and lush .
output.sentences: Leaves that are wet during cold snaps become covered in ice.
The trees still offer a lovely view.
Plants may not remain alive after they are frosted over.
Animals frequently leave tracks in the snow.
The snow melt contributes to water necessary for lush, green growth.
